typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		name as string,
		age as string,
		addresses as (street as string, city as string, type as string, contact as (number as string, areaCode as string)[])[],
		friends as (name as string, city as string, contact as (number as string, areaCode as string)[])[]
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	limit: 100,
	documentForm: 'singleDocument') ~> source3
source3 foldDown(unroll(addresses),
	mapColumn(
		name,
		age,
		street = addresses.street,
		city = addresses.city,
		type = addresses.type,
		contact = addresses.contact,
		friends
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten2
Flatten4 foldDown(unroll(friends, friends),
	mapColumn(
		name,
		age,
		street,
		city,
		type,
		number,
		areaCode,
		{friends.name} = friends.name,
		{friends.city} = friends.city,
		contact = friends.contact
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten3
Flatten2 foldDown(unroll(contact, contact),
	mapColumn(
		name,
		age,
		street,
		city,
		type,
		number = contact.number,
		areaCode = contact.areaCode,
		friends
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten4
Flatten3 foldDown(unroll(contact, contact),
	mapColumn(
		name,
		age,
		street,
		city,
		type,
		{address.number} = number,
		{address.areaCode} = areaCode,
		{friends.name},
		{friends.city},
		number = contact.number,
		areaCode = contact.areaCode
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> Flatten5
Flatten5 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
